name: OuiShare Labs
body:
## OuiShare Labs Camp 2014
**What?** Collaborative environment for hacking and visioning  
**Who?** Coders and visionaries working on open source tools to fuel the collaborative economy  
**When?** May 1-4, 2014, just before the [OuiShare Fest 2014](http://www.ouisharefest.com/)  
**Where?** Paris, venue to be determined  

**Come bring your team/project and work on your stuff within the collaborative environment!**

###IF
* you’re a coder/visionary/designer/… and want to work on creating meaningful things for common good; OR
* you have created an open source tool and want to present it; OR
* you want to find out what’s happening in the open source technologies; OR
* you have an idea/project and want to create a prototype; OR
* you’re looking for likeminded people/projects to create something bigger with joined forces,
...then OuiShare Labs Camp 2014 is for you!

[Join the event on Facebook »](https://www.facebook.com/events/248376575333608/)

###OuiShare Labs social links
* [Follow our Facebook page »](http://www.facebook.com/ouisharelabs)
* [Join our Facebook group »](https://www.facebook.com/groups/OuiShare.Labs/)
* [OuiShare Labs on Twitter »](https://twitter.com/ouisharelabs)
* [OuiShare Labs on Google+ »](http://google.com/+ouisharelabs)
* [OuiShare Labs on YouTube »](http://www.youtube.com/ouisharelabs)
